metadata.title: CVE-2024-46778 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check UnboundedRequestEnabled's valueCalculateSwathAndDETConfiguration_params_st's UnboundedRequestEnabledis a pointer (i.e. dml_bool_t *UnboundedRequestEnabled), and thusif (p->UnboundedRequestEnabled) checks its address, not bool value.This fixes 1 REVERSE_INULL issue reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
